note.p: Scholar and physician. Trained in Edinburgh. Married Mary Ann Foster, a servant, and left for Hong Kong in 1846. Resident surgeon of the Victoria Seamens’ Hospital, Hong Kong. Contributed studies on Chinese medicine and physiology to the Royal Asiatic Society.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1266/4/33/5)
London Church of England parish registers P90/PAN1/088 (Ancestry.com, accessed 25 August 2022)
